did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Self-published collections of her writings, copies of published articles and chapters, some of her unpublished pieces, and a collection of flyers and posters, mostly on Latina lesbian themes.
did.langmaterial: Collection material in English and Spanish

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: tatiana de la tierra was one of the founders and editors of the Latina lesbian magazines, Esto No Tienne Nombre and Conmocion. Her writings have appeared in periodicals and anthologies since 1987. In 2002, she published the book For The Hard Ones: A Lesbian Phenomenology.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Self-published collections of her writings, copies of published articles and chapters, some of her unpublished pieces, and a collection of flyers and posters, mostly on Latina lesbian themes.
